revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Pronto Networks |model=Wavespot |revision= |upc=609728995768 |ean= |asin=B004I57CJK |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/01/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Tensun tek Electronic |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=ZT6TS-PHR300 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640DBTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IC42S16160C-7TL |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;;2; |flags=schematics,boot log |stock_boot=U-Boot;3.4;Ralink; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21.7; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Wavespot,Wavespot-Free-Internet |default_ssid_regex=^Wavespot$,,,^Wavespot-Free-Internet$ |default_ip=192.168.4.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:25:22 |oui_eth=00:25:22 |default_ch= }} [http://www.wavespot.net/ Product homepage]
[http://wavespot.net/manual.html?v=start_guide Quick start guide] Manufactured by Tensun tek Electronic, same hardware appears to be used for the ProntoPoint-AP (FCC ID: TVVPPAP-USB ?) The device is pictured with a label showing a MAC address of 00:25:22:2F:?0:00 in the FCC internal photos. This is corroborated with WiGLE data for the default SSIDs. "QK-IP2202 V1.1" is silkscreened on the board. The power adapter included with the device is a HB12-09010SPA (9V, 1A). == Defaults == The manual mentions the default AP passkey as being the last 6 digits of the MAC address printed on the label (w/ upper case letters). The manual also mentions that 'Wavespot' has IP addresses in the 192.168.4.x range and '''Wavespot-Free-Internet''' has addresses in the 192.168.3.x range. ==Images== File:Pronto Networks Wavespot angled.png|overview shot File:Pronto Networks Wavespot leds.png|LEDs File:Pronto Networks Wavespot back.png|back File:Pronto Networks Wavespot box.png|box File:Pronto Networks Wavespot in box.png|in box [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]] File:Pronto Wavespot angled.jpg|angled File:Pronto Wavespot bottom.jpg|bottom File:Pronto Wavespot power adapter.jpg|power adapter File:Pronto Wavespot board top.jpg|board top File:Pronto Wavespot board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
         J2 [VCC] (Tx) (Rx) (GND)

|RT3052|
